description: Comprehensive test cases for pulmonary nodule management recommendations covering solid nodules, ground-glass nodules, and part-solid nodules with all size ranges and risk stratification
primaryReference: MacMahon H, et al. Guidelines for Management of Incidental Pulmonary Nodules Detected on CT Images: From the Fleischner Society 2017. Radiology. 2017;284(1):228-243.

expectedOutputs.Recommendation: No routine follow-up
expectedOutputs.Rationale: Very low probability of malignancy (<1%) for nodules <6mm in low-risk patients

testCases.calculationSteps: Step 1: Identify nodule type as solid. Step 2: Single nodule. Step 3: Size 4mm is <6mm threshold. Step 4: Low risk patient. Step 5: Per Fleischner 2017 Table 1, no routine follow-up recommended.
testCases.medicalReference: Fleischner 2017, Table 1: Solid nodules - Single <6mm, Low risk
